channel.title: Just a noob question.... though im not much of a noob
channel.description: if i die do i lose all items im holding or wearing? i died once and only lost what was in inventory and a addy helm (well i didnt die i was about to die and i hi the x on top of screen when i logged back in i was in lumby without a helm)

item.title: Just a noob question.... though im not much of a noob
item.dc:creator: @lax_mikel lax mikel
item.description:
@lax_mikel wrote:

u keep 3 items, your best items, if you are none skulled

Read full topic

item.title: Just a noob question.... though im not much of a noob
item.dc:creator: @legend_rene legend rene
item.description:
@legend_rene wrote:

[quote=“alex4ever, post:12, topic:108928”][quote author=legend rene link=topic=155869.msg1468041#msg1468041 date=1181586922]
Re:just a noob question… though im not much of a noob

hmm are you sure the title is right because this seems really like a noob to me ,
every i repeat EVERY singe player knows skulled = no items and when you normally die u keep the 3 most valuable items ,
when you leave wild the skull remains for 15 minutes so don’t die then you still lose everything…

I don’t get something , why do all noobs go to moparscape? when i was a noob i just looked trough the runescape help pages … helped alot in the beginning later i just didnt care what runescape said…
[/quote]so your calling me a noob … im level 100 who dident use help pages i did it buy myself u used help pages and why you on moparscape you calling yourself a noob.[/quote]

Ehm try learning proper english before posting , and I was talking to ‘tryed to hack it’,
So whats the point…
And level has nothing to do with being a ‘noob’ or not , a level 126 can be a noob , and when you see a lower level he does not have to be a noob , they can be more experienced then you.

Read full topic

item.title: Just a noob question.... though im not much of a noob
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

yes when u die u lose every thing besides your 3 best items
in members world there are some mini games that if u die u dont
but if u go in the wildy attack first u get skulls and u do lose all your stuff
yes u do lose every thing u are wearing and that u are careing in your invitory
the wildy is located all the way north there is a wildy ditch

hope i helped
~alex4ever

Read full topic
item.source: Just a noob question.... though im not much of a noob

item.title: Just a noob question.... though im not much of a noob
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Wow you are a noob, lol nvm we were all noobs once.

When you die you keep the 3 most valued items in ure inventory. So if you have 3 rune plates and 3 addy plates, you will keep the 3 rune plates.

But only for shop prices does this work, e.g. if you had a phat and 3 rune plates, then you would keep the 3 rune plates and not the very valuable phat.

Ofcourse if you are in the wilderness and have been skulled you lose EVERYTHING when you die.

Read full topic
